mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.*,COUNT(`d_id`) ccount FROM `cdetails` a,`commodity` b,`discuss` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND b.`cy_id`=c.`cy_id` AND b.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}

SELECT a.`cy_id`,a.`cy_name`,a.`cy_price`,a.`cy_discount`, c.`p_image` FROM `commodity` a,`cdetails` b,`product` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND b.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND a.`cy_discount`>0.6 ORDER BY a.`cy_discount` ASC
SELECT a.`cy_id`,a.`cy_name`,a.`cy_discount`,a.cy_sales, b.`p_image` FROM `commodity` a,`product` b,`cdetails` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=c.`cy_id` AND c.`cs_id`=b.`cs_id` ORDER BY a.`cy_sales` DESC
SELECT a.`cy_name`,a.`cy_price`,a.`cy_inventory`,b.`cs_version`,c.`p_image` FROM `commodity` a,`cdetails` b,`product` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND b.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND a.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}
SELECT * FROM `discuss` a,`commodity` b,`users` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND a.`u_id`=c.`u_id` AND b.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}
SELECT * FROM `discuss` a,`commodity` b,`users` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND a.`u_id`=c.`u_id` AND a.`d_star` >=4 AND b.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}
SELECT * FROM `discuss` a,`commodity` b,`users` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND a.`u_id`=c.`u_id` AND a.`d_star` =3 AND b.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}
SELECT * FROM `discuss` a,`commodity` b,`users` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND a.`u_id`=c.`u_id` AND a.`d_star`=1 AND b.`cy_id`=#{cy_id}
